title: Advice For Selling  Set of T205
author: cammb

posts.post_title: Advice For Selling  Set of T205
posts.post_content: I want to sell a set of T 205 gold border cards.  Missing only the Hoblitzell no stats and the Wilhelm suffered.  Most card s are good to vg.  I have a couple of beaters as well as a couple of vg/ex to ex.   Advice whether to sell as a set or individually.  Also cant find a catalog value for this et.  To play it safe I would grade as Good+.
